alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Central Coast Range of Western Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 06 at 7:28AM PST until November 07 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM PST MONDAY ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 2000 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to 5 inches. * WHERE...Central Coast Range of Western Oregon and Cascade Foothills in Lane County. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 11 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit https://www.tripcheck.com

area.areaDesc: Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Central Coast Range of Western Oregon
